org.yamcs

Class YamcsInstanceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.YamcsInstanceService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    YamcsServerInstance

    public abstract class YamcsInstanceService
extends Object
    Inspired from Guava services, this class offers the following states:
    • OFFLINE
    • INITIALIZING
    • INITIALIZED
    • STARTING
    • RUNNING
    • STOPPING
    • FAILED
    transitions are allowed back to OFFLINE from all steady states

      • notifyInitialized

        protected final void notifyInitialized()
        Implementing classes should invoke this method once their service has been initialized.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the service is not YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.STARTING.

      • notifyStarted

        protected final void notifyStarted()
        Implementing classes should invoke this method once their service has started. It will cause the service to transition from YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.STARTING to YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.RUNNING.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the service is not YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.STARTING.

      • notifyStopped

        protected final void notifyStopped()
        Implementing classes should invoke this method once their service has stopped. It will cause the service to transition from YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.STOPPING to YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.OFFLINE.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the service is neither YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.STOPPING nor YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.RUNNING.

      • failureCause

        public final Throwable failureCause()

      • notifyFailed

        protected final void notifyFailed(Throwable cause)
        Invoke this method to transition the service to the YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState.FAILED. The service will not be stopped if it is running. Invoke this method when a service has failed critically or otherwise cannot be started nor stopped.

      • offline

        public void offline(YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState from)

      • stopping

        public void stopping(YamcsManagement.YamcsInstance.InstanceState from)
